column2: BMW CEO hints there is space for more electric models VIENNA
column3: Aug 2 The chief executive of BMW  hinted in a German paper that there was potential for another of its "i" electric car models.

column2: Malaysia says airplane debris found on Reunion Island part of Boeing 777 KUALA LUMPUR
column3: Aug 2 Malaysia said on Sunday that airplane debris that washed up on the Indian Ocean island of Reunion has been identified as being from a Boeing 777
column4: the same model as Malaysian Airlines flight MH370 which vanished early last year.

column2: UPDATE 1-Verizon workers in U.S. East could strike on Sunday
column3: union saysVerizon workers in U.S. East could strike on Sunday
column4: union says Thousands of Verizon Communications Inc workers on the U.S. East Coast could strike on Sunday with no sign of an agreement as contract negotiations with unions went to the wire
column5: a union spokeswoman said on Saturday.  Verizon workers in U.S. East could strike on Sunday
